titles.title: Hymn 170 - My life, my love I give to thee

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
My life, my love I give to thee
Thou lamb of God who died for me
Oh, may I ever be faithful
My savior and my God

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
I'll live for him who died for me
How happy then my life shall be
I'll live for him who died for me
My savior and my God.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I now believe thou dost receive
For thou hast died hat I might live
And now henceforth I'll trust in thee
My savior and my God

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O thou who died on calvary
To save my soul and make me free
I'll consecrate my life to thee
My savior and my God.
